text: Barbara Taylor Bradford OBE, (10 May 1933 â€“ 24 November 2024) was a British- American novelist. Her debut novel, A Woman of Substance, was published in 1979 and has sold over 30 million copies worldwide. It ranks as one of the top-ten bestselling novels of all-time. She was born in Leeds, Yorkshire. Bradford died on 24 November 2024 in New York City at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Barbara Taylor Bradford's blog Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:British novelists Category:American novelists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Writers from Yorkshire
title: Barbara Taylor Bradford
